review_data.title: Health Warning
review_data.content: The small toilet is always dirty, very dangerous to use. Nobody cleans the tiny shithouse. No towels, no clean seat, piss all over, yucky!

review_data.title: Metal BAR!!!
review_data.content: Nice people, very good environment if you like metal. Even if you don't like it, you are among friends...in Black clothes! Man in Black could be checking you out, who knows :)

review_data.title: Goodmusic and wide variety of beers.

review_data.title: Bar metal per eccellenza :)
review_data.content: Ormai tappa fissa durante i soggiorni zurighesi, varietà di birre, musica fantastica e ambiente simpatico.

review_data.title: It's okay to go to the dark side
review_data.content: I stopped in at Ebrietas during the 'Day of Open Bars & Clubs'. Its a little hard rock bar in the Nieder-dorf. Don't be hesitant about stepping inside and going to the dark side. The bar has about nine stools, wooden tables and chairs, padded...More

review_data.title: My Metalhead boyfriend brought me here...
review_data.content: Good music and the drinks are decently priced for an expensive city like Zurich. Will have to try their food one day. Went down on St Patrick Saturday and they were closed. Bugger for me... This was the first bar I patronised in Zurich. Ebrietas...More

review_data.title: Exellent lunch!
review_data.content: If you are looking for a geat place to spend your time, than the embrietas is the right it! At lunchtime they serve you a great menu for little money. During the day they play blues. At night you have a great metal bar with...More

review_data.title: Auch bei Tageslicht auf jeden Fall ein Besuch Wert!
review_data.content: Sympathisches Personal. Originelle, preiswerte Mittagsmenues und liebevoll zubereitet. Grosse Bierauswahl und starker Kaffee. Das ganze begleitet mit guter, ruhiger Musik👍

review_data.title: super küche, günstig- mit toller atmosphäre! kinder willkommen
review_data.content: Das Ebrietas ist mein Geheimtipp im Herzen von Zürich :) die Einrichtung ist im rockigen Stil gehalten. Eine erlesene Musikauswahl...More

review_data.title: Good Bar with a good Vibe!
review_data.content: The Ebrietas bar is a rather "alternative" bar with a focus on Heavy and Death Metal fans. But it does have great beers for post-dinner drinks with your friends! A must do for Heavy Metal fans in Zurich!
